1290950.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night TP121 Weird World War II
1290950.description:
Devin Night TP121 Weird World War II

TP121 Weird World War II, This pack contains 81 hand-drawn and colored tokens of soldiers from the WWII era and a few monsters and vehicles.
This product contains:
  • 6 American Soldiers
  • Artilery
  • Dragon Black
  • 2 Edwards
  • German Ogre
  • 9 Gestapo
  • Gestapo Elf
  • Gestapo Human
  • Gestapo Medieval
  • Johnny
  • Mac
  • Plane
  • 18 Planes WWWII
  • Pyotr
  • Squat Tank
  • SS Black Medieval
  • 5 SS Black Uniform
  • 3 SS Grey Medieval
  • 2 SS Grey Uniform
  • SS Grey Uniform Elf
  • 2 SS Grey Uniform Humans
  • 3 SS Grey Uniform Orcs
  • SS Medieval Archer
  • 2 Staffcar
  • Staffcar empty
  • Suit
  • Tank Copy
  • 12 Tanks WWWII
Converted by:  
James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
